channel.title: Need help port forwarding...i think thats the problem
channel.description: ok so i am trying to make my own server...i have the source a client no-ip and i have done the port forwarding...when i run my server i try to advertise it and it says its offline....i have done everything that god ikiliki said on his tutorial but somehow it says my server if offline....plz some1 help me :(
